name: Hide n Seek
description:
Little kids play Hide n Seek, in a haunted house, on Halloween night.

You're it!

Collect the candy your friend's dropped to find to where they're hiding, but watch out for ghosts!

You're easily frightened and a single touch from a ghost will confuse or send you into a panic!

Use your flashlight or hide in well-lit areas to ward away ghosts. Using the flashlight on them wastes battery, but your friends have extras!

Find all your friends to win!
